function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased garden usage associated with better health outcomes","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the association between garden usage and health outcomes","Mitigation":"Provide clear context and limitations of the study findings","Technologies":"Communication strategies, statistical analysis","People":"Public, researchers","Owner":"Research institution, public health organizations"},{"Description":"No significant difference in health outcomes between gardening and non-gardening groups","Impact":"Potential misunderstanding of the health benefits of gardening","Mitigation":"Emphasize other potential benefits of gardening beyond self-reported health outcomes","Technologies":"Data visualization, public health messaging","People":"Public, gardening enthusiasts","Owner":"Public health organizations, gardening associations"},{"Description":"Association between garden usage and anxiety related to COVID-19","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the impact of garden usage on anxiety levels","Mitigation":"Provide clear explanation of the specific factors influencing anxiety related to COVID-19","Technologies":"Educational materials, mental health interventions","People":"Public, individuals experiencing anxiety","Owner":"Public health organizations, mental health professionals"}]}
